name: ColliderMania Demo
description:
Tick tock... a game where it's pretty much like any other mobile game. except for PC.

You Control a cube that needs to get to a spot in 90 seconds if not well... you lose.

boxes and metal boxes are not harmful but they can slow you down...

PS please if you find any bugs or glitches please tell me about them in the comments. ill be reading them. Thank you <3

This Game has been recently updated

What Changed?

-Added Pause Menu

-if you die on a specific level you reset to that specific level

-Added Win Menu

-Extra Level

also this game is really short but thanks for playing ;)
